CustomField.formula: IF ( TEXT( CRM_PoliticheCreditizie__c ) = 'In', IMAGE('/resource/greenCircle_small', "Green",18,18), IF ( TEXT(CRM_PoliticheCreditizie__c) = 'Out', IMAGE('/resource/redCircle_small', "Red",18,18), IF ( TEXT(CRM_PoliticheCreditizie__c) = 'Neutral', IMAGE('/resource/orangeCircle_small', "Orange",18,18), NULL ) ) )
CustomField.label: Icon politiche creditizie
